alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Pine (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 31 at 8:15AM CDT until March 31 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CDT THIS MORNING AND THEN COMES BACK INTO EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 AM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory this morning, freezing drizzle and winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the Winter Weather Advisory tonight, total snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Carlton and South St. Louis and Pine Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Fond du Lac Band and the Mille Lacs Band, Hinckley and, Lena Lake areas. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory this morning, until 10 AM CDT this morning. For the Winter Weather Advisory tonight, from 4 PM this afternoon to 7 AM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
